title: Smart Data Models - Environment base schema
description: Common NGSI-LD definitions for Environment data models

airQualityIndex.description: Property. Air quality index corresponding to the air quality observed. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

airQualityLevel.description: Property. Overall qualitative level of health concern corresponding to the air quality observed. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

TimeSeriesAggregation.description: Property. Object defining the temporal processing of a basic property during a period. It provides Maximum, minimum, instant value and average

instValue.description: Property. Instant value of temporal processing

minOverTime.description: Property. Minimum value of temporal processing over time

maxOverTime.description: Property. Maximum value of temporal processing over time

averageValue.description: Property. Average value of temporal processing over time
